name: Ducky's Great Escape
description:
This is the first Unity game we made with our Independent Video Game Design program.  We were asked to make a maze game and we decided to turn it into a prison escape adventure with cute ducky and froggie characters! Hope you enjoy!

I plan to add a menu scene, sound effects, health bar and more!

The team: Juan Fernando Osorio Varela, Julien Escobar Hellou, Ray Nadeau, Marianne Perignon
